| HistoryText             =
===Origin===
The origin of the Unforgiven Dead, and of [[Suma-Ket (Earth-616)|Suma-Ket]], remains a mystery.{{r|Namor the Sub-Mariner #37|; From the Royal Archives of the Imperial House of Tha-Korr}}{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z #11|; [[Suma-Ket (Earth-616)|Suma-Ket]]'s entry}} though they were alternatively stated to be [[undead]] [[Homo mermanus|Atlanteans]],{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Atlantis]]' entry}} a foreign tribe,{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z #1|; [[Atlantis]]' entry }} a race,{{r|All-New Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z #11|; [[Suma-Ket (Earth-616)|Suma-Ket]]'s entry}}{{r|Marvel Mystery Handbook 70th Anniversary Special #1|; [[Fen (Earth-616)|Fen]]'s entry}} and it was even speculated they might be perhaps originating from [[Hades (Underworld)|Hades]].{{r|Namor the Sub-Mariner #37|; From the Royal Archives of the Imperial House of Tha-Korr}}<!-- 

possibly Homo meranus tribe? (hints in #38

worshipers of the Elder Gods{{r|Namor the Sub-Mariner #37}} [[Great Old Ones|Old Ones]]{{r|Namor the Sub-Mariner #37|; From the Royal Archives of the Imperial House of Tha-Korr}} Dark Gods{{r|Namor the Sub-Mariner #38}}--><!--
